doc.field: i hope people make a decision what they think is good for the country. and i think we'll be fine as a party. people have had a belly full of what has gone on. you talked about that today at the top of your show. we need to get to the business of unifying the party, i believe we will do that. i'm not full of anxiety about this, i'm full of hope, confidence and climate change. when you meet people around the
